title: Short-Intensive CMC-Based English Education Program: Enhancing Autonomous Learning and Digital Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Utilization of CMC (Computer-Mediated Communication) tools as supplementary materials in offline classes, aiming to improve learner autonomy and digital communication skills. Continuous feedback on learning processes through formative assessment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the process of submitting English assignments and receiving feedback using CMC tools (messaging apps, video conferencing platforms).
Learners can understand and apply over 80% of feedback written in English within CMC environments.
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans (e.g., writing English diaries three times weekly) on digital platforms.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
